dialogue.String: 1�An odd sound, you say?
1�I don't hear anything except your impending doom.This place is dangerous. I suggest you make tracks.
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Blue recommendation letter.A Little Knowledge(pt.1).A Little Knowledge(pt.2).A Little Knowledge(pt.3).Burden of Suspicion.On Sabbatical(pt.1).On Sabbatical(pt.2).Downward Helix(pt.1).Downward Helix(pt.2).Downward Helix(pt.3).Seeing Blood-red(pt.1).Seeing Blood-red(pt.2).Seeing Blood-red(pt.3).Seeing Blood-red(pt.4).Beneath the Mask(pt.1).Beneath the Mask(pt.2).Delkfutt the Great(pt.1).Delkfutt the Great(pt.2).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�There's all sorts of creepy things wandering around down here.Watch your back.
1�You're looking for a map?Could this be a piece of it, you think?
1�You're lucky you caught me. I was about to throw it into the brazier here.Not much you can do with a third of a map...
1�Listen. If you stand still long enough, you can sometimes hear the sound of claws scraping the other side of these doors...
1�The Eldieme Necropolis is currently being utilized as an allied forces supply post under the administration of the Republican Army of Bastok.
1�The Goblin Leadavox in Vunkerl Inlet will set you up with 6���� for sure.Just bring her  $���� and  $���� and the deed's as good as done.

1�That Nicolaus fellow just rushed off for the capital like he had a pack of hell hounds on his tail.What about those archives could stir up such excitement? Just a bunch of dusty old tomes, if you ask me.
1�You find a piece of the map by the base of the gravestone!
1�You find a piece of the map lying on top of the sarcophagus!
1�So, you meet your pixie quota yet?
1�The Republic is always recruiting...Sign me up!I have more pixies to catch.
1�Hold it right there. You don't look like one of ours.
1�An adventurer? Isn't that rich! Off chasing pixies while we're here dying in the trenches. Why not make yourself useful for a change?
1�The Republic is always recruiting...Sign me up!I have more pixies to catch.
1�Hmph, then get out of my face before I decide I need to hear somebody scream.
1�What do you know? There may be something worth salvaging under that fancy armor of yours.
1�Alright. The Republican Legion's Fourth Division is currently undergoing some restructuring, and they're accepting applications for new recruits.
1�Hold on while I write you up a letter of recommendation.
1�Here. Take this to Bastok and show it to Centurion Adelbrecht.

1�You'll probably have to pass a few aptitude tests before they give you your stripes, but the Republic can't afford to toss away meat before putting it in the grinder, so don't worry too much about failing.
1�And that's i
t.�...and by ��it,�� I mean that's all I can help you with. You're still left one hell of a trip.
1�The roads to Bastok are crawling with ruthless beastman scouts just itching to add another notch to their axes.

1�If you get spotted, you can always play the brave �[man/woman] and fight the scum, but the Republic needs live soldiers, not ones in body bags. Turn tail and run away, live to kill another day--that's my motto.
1�Oh! A potential pupil!Have you come to enroll in the Schultz School of Martial Theory?
1�Did you come to sign up?Where's the dotted line?I was just looking for the latrine...
1�Such enthusiasm!
1�It's just a pity you don't seem to have the prerequisite experience...
1�Oh, I see.A mind is such a terrible thing to waste...
1�Such enthusiasm!We certainly welcome beginners.
1�Ah, how positively rude of me.
1�You may address me as Professor Erlene.As well as serving on the Operations Staff here in the necropolis, I teach martial theory to academic applicants in my capacity as a military scholar.
1�And what is martial theory, you ask?In a nutshell, it is the study of applying tactics and strategy to ensure victory on the field of battle.
1�The Schultz School of Martial Theory mainly focuses on the study of ancient military magic texts known as ��grimoires.��
1�The beauty of this approach is the effective incorporation of spells and incantations into the latest strategies and tactics.
1�Pupils schooled in Schultz martial theory are valued across Vana'diel as military tacticians.
1�Allow me to demonstrate the dual nature of the grimoire.
1�That was the white grimoire.
1�And this, the black grimoire.
1�Do I have your full attention now?
1�Utilizing the teachings of the Schultz theories, one is able to switch between the two as the situation demands.
1�What is all the commotio
n?�Professor Ulbrecht, when did you return?
1�Must I introduce myself to our guest, Professor Erlene?
1�Greetings, I am Professor Ulbrecht, chief of operations of the Republican Army of Bastok.
1�Hehehe.From my observations, I would say your interest was captured more by that flashy grimoire display than Professor Erlene's explanation of Schultz martial theory!
1�Ah, I do not mean to criticize.It is natural for us to feel wonder at the things we do not understand.That curiosity is your ally.
1�However, mastery of the grimoire requires more than simple enthusiasm.A pity, but I do not think you--
1�Oh, enough of your ponderous blustering, Professor.
1���The gates of knowledge must not be closed to one with a willingness to learn.��Is this not a fundamental law of the Schultz school?
1�Do not take the professor's flippant dismissal to heart--you will have your chance to learn.
1�There are, however, certain requirements.You must understand, the grimoires are valuable tomes...
1�Ah, I am not seeking to deprive you of coin.There are other--
1��%����!We have a dire shortage of %����!
1�Have I misspoken?Do we not require this material in abundance?
1�While the matter is not terribly urgent, I believe twelve %���� should cover our needs.
1�You have your task. Altana's fortune smile upon you!
1�Professor Ulbrecht!This applicant has yet to be processed!
1�Twelve! Not one less!5
1�Professor...!
1�<Sigh>...If you would be so kind as to collect twelve %����, I shall begin planning an exclusive curriculum for your introduction to martial theory.
1�While I am still rather irked at Professor Ulbrecht's imposition, it is true we scholars can never have enough vellum in stock.
1�I have already prepared your grimoire from our available supplies, of course.
1�Inside, I have inscribed a curriculum on which to base your studies.
1�However, we scholars learn the laws of magic as a single theory, and thus overcome the disadvantages inherent in specialization.
1�In simple terms, we are able to utilize the full potential of both forms of magic.

1�From a tactical point of view, a scholar can choose the incantation most suitable for the task at hand, regardless of school.That is the strength that lies at the heart of the Schultz School of Martial Theory.
1�But rather than listen to me drone, you would be better served by reading the grimoire and experiencing the theory for yourself.One learns faster through ��doing,�� yes?
1�Very well.Let's have you read the first page while producing an ��arcane tap�� effect.
1�This manifestation of arcane energy will trigger the astral properties of the grimoire, and empower the words within.
1�It will also serve to attune the tome to your personal astral signature.
1�An arcane tap effect is somewhat different to the sudden burst of magic provided by spells such as ��Fire.��It is a steady stream of magical energy.
1�Both ��Manafont�� and ��Chainspell�� are examples of arcane tap effects.How else can I explain...?
1�Ah, yes.While similar, ��Benediction�� will not produce the required energy.The magical power of such abilities dissipate at the culmination of spellcasting.
1�Do you understand the difference?
1�Now, initiate whichever arcane tap effect is available to you, and open the grimoire to the first page in order to complete the attunement process.
1�Hmm, if I'm not mistaken, it appears you are not currently capable of tapping into a steady source of arcane energy...
1�How vexing.You must have the ability to produce an arcane tap effect, or we cannot proceed with the attunement.
1�It must be a source of magic originating from the applicant...
1�I'm sorry, this is a stumbling block that you alone must overcome.
]!��The complete set of mog tablets has been restored to Ru'Lude Gardens!The ancient magic of King Kupofried permeates the air to instill adventurers in this area with its Super Kupower
1�So, you meet your pixie quota yet?
1�The Republic is always recruiting...Sign me up!I have more pixies to catch.

�=��A mog tablet has been discovered in  �[West Ronfaure/East Ronfaure/the La Theine Plateau/the Valkurm Dunes/Jugner Forest/the Batallia Downs/North Gustaberg/South Gustaberg/the Konschtat Highlands/the Pashhow Marshlands/the Rolanberry Fields/Beaucedine Glacier/Xarcabard/West Sarutabaruta/East Sarutabaruta/the Tahrongi Canyon/the Buburimu Peninsula/the Meriphataud Mountains/the Sauromugue Champaign/Qufim Island/Behemoth's Dominion/Cape Teriggan/the Eastern Altepa Desert/the Sanctuary of Zi'Tah/Ro'Maeve/the Yuhtunga Jungle/the Yhoator Jungle/the Western Altepa Desert/the Valley of Sorrows
1�Trial: Have your pet deal the finishing blow to a set number of  [experience-yielding monsters/monsters] under the prescribed weather conditions, or on the corresponding day of the week.
1�Hold it right there. You don't look like one of ours.
t.�The synergy image has taken for
�!��This area is currently affected by the Super Kupower: ��Treasure Hound�
1�The synergy furnace is currently in use by .
1�Hmph, then get out of my face before I decide I need to hear somebody scream.
�!��This area is currently affected by the Super Kupower: ��Artisan's Advantage�
1�What do you know? There may be something worth salvaging under that fancy armor of yours.
1�Alright. The Republican Legion's Fourth Division is currently undergoing some restructuring, and they're accepting applications for new recruits.
1�Hold on while I write you up a letter of recommendation.
1�Here. Take this to Bastok and show it to Centurion Adelbrecht.
1�And that's i
..��The synergy furnace regains its durabilit
1�You won't be considered a member of the Fighting Fourth until you take that 3���� to Bastok and show it to Centurion Adelbrecht.
1�Oh, and good luck with the entrance exam. Though, the Republic can't afford to toss away meat before putting it in the grinder, so I wouldn't worry too much about the test.
1�I heard the news, recruit.Welcome to the Fourth...but don't let it go to your head. Let's see how long you last first.
1�The roads to Bastok are crawling with ruthless beastman scouts just itching to add another notch to their axes.

1�If you get spotted, you can always play the brave �[man/woman] and fight the scum, but the Republic needs live soldiers, not ones in body bags. Turn tail and run away, live to kill another day--that's my motto.
1�Your first task is to collect twelve %����.Once you have the requisite materials, please deliver them here to me.
1�An arcane tap effect is somewhat different to the sudden burst of magic provided by spells such as ��Fire.��It is a steady stream of magical energy.
1�Both ��Manafont�� and ��Chainspell�� are examples of arcane tap effects.How else can I explain...?
1�Ah, yes.While similar, ��Benediction�� will not produce the required energy.The magical power of such abilities dissipate at the culmination of spellcasting.
1�Now, initiate whichever arcane tap effect is available to you, and open the grimoire to the first page in order to complete the attunement process.
1�Hmm, if I'm not mistaken, it appears you are not currently capable of tapping into a steady source of arcane energy...
1�How vexing.You must have the ability to produce an arcane tap effect, or we cannot proceed with the attunement.
1�Phew, my heart is racing.One never knows when Professor Schultz will make an appearance...
1�You are extremely fortunate to have been blessed with his guidance so early in your career.Lock those words in your mind,  , and never let them go.
1�This isn't the first time this has happened.The professor went missing before, some time ago.
1�At that time it was a pupil of his named Nicolaus who was eventually able to locate him.Come to mention it, perhaps he would be able to provide you with some helpful information.
1�After that he enjoyed several promotions, and is now an eminent member of Bastok's Mythril Musketeers.So you should be able to find him in the Metalworks.
1�Please, Professor Schultz must be found.6Oh, and don't forget to pass along 3����!
1�I'm elated to hear that the professor is alright.I owe you a debt of gratitude.
1�Thank you again for your help.If you're still worried about Professor Schultz, you'll be happy to hear that he is safe now.
1�Ulbrecht orchestrated a marvel of military extraction and was able to rescue him.It is only under such extreme circumstances that his true affection for the professor becomes evident.
1�I apologize. It was rude of me to presume...It's just that... No, I'm sorry. I will not trouble you with it.
1�The council will be held in San d'Oria.Unfortunately, I have other pressing matters, and will be unable to attend.
1�I owe you a great debt,  . You have my thanks.And please let me know if there is anything which you might require.
1�Word has reached me that the next appointed meeting ground is Sauromugue Champaign.
1�Head south from here, and just as you exit the Rolanberry Fields, cross the Great Jeuno Bridge.The champaign lies just beyond.
1�You must hurry!
1�It had not occurred to me until now, but to think...If all those who wield magic are being targeted, then that would mean we scholars are at risk as well.
1�To best protect ourselves it would be wise to avoid being unaccompanied at all times. Whether at home or abroad.
1� , you have not yet gained wide recognition as a scholar.I pray that puts you at less risk than the others.
1�When you meet with them, please, advise them strongly against traveling or moving about on their own.
1�I have a feeling the time will come when I will have to rely on you yet again,  .Until then, I leave you in the grace and favor of the Goddess.
1�I am thankful that at least you have remained safe.
1�Hm? Nicolaus's advice?
1���Whenever the professor disappears with a specific aim in mind, he leaves behind clues in his wake, without fail.Search for these, and you will find finding him not so daunting a task.��
1�Perhaps such a hint could be found in the spot where you first located the professor!
1�I would suggest trying your luck there first.I will attempt to obtain more information from other sources.
1�If my supposition is correct, the formula and the stratagem that works in tandem with it should be written out somewhere in Grauberg!
1�Go and find that formula,  !It will almost certainly take you to the Ruhotz Silvermines.
1�You lost the transcription that I made for you?Well, it sure is a good thing that I hung onto that letter instead of you!
1�Alright, then. I'll transcribe you another copy, I suppose.But I'm all out of #����.
1�This won't do at all...Would you happen to have any,  ?

1�I'd like nothing more than to make another copy of this formula for you, but unfortunately I'm out of #����.There's a lot of writing in a very small space... It must be of the finest quality, I'm afraid.
1�Things have been so hectic lately I haven't had the chance to resupply.Would you happen to have any,  ?
1�A #����!Give me just a moment then, and I'll make you another copy of the professor's letter.
1�If my supposition is correct, the formula and the stratagem that works in tandem with it should be written out somewhere in Grauberg!
1�Go and find that formula,  !It will almost certainly take you to the Ruhotz Silvermines.
1�You have faced many trials in getting here today, but the war continues.We scholars still have a great deal of work to do.
1���To know is to act��!Let us show the world what we scholars know!
1�Well, if it isn't my prize pupil.I trust that your studies in the Schultz School of Martial Theory have been serving you well afield.

1�Incidentally, you are familiar with the technique we call ��Tabula Rasa,�� are you not?A monumental breakthrough in the history of our school, it allows us scholars to wield strategems with nary a concern for charges.
1�Already knew that, you say? Well, then perhaps you're ready for the honors class.Ready your parchment and quill--it's time for one of Professor Erlene's acclaimed lectures!

1�Mastering Tabula Rasa, you see, allows the scholar unprecedented options in combat.Strategems may be combined and battle tactics altered at will to account for subtle ebbs and flows in the tide of battle.

1�Needless to say, it falls upon you, the scholar, to use this heightened potential effectively.With your time limited, simply unleashing your strategies haphazardly will afford you few benefits, if any at all.
1�It is precisely this discernment and poise under pressure that separates the great tacticians of our time from the multitudes who excel in the classroom but flounder on the field of battle.
1�But let us return to the topic at hand.
1�No doubt you've heard tales of warriors who--in the times of greatest crisis--were able to summon heretofore-untapped reserves of strength.
1�One might say that Tabula Rasa serves a similar function for us.Of course, its benefits are of the mental and psychological variety rather than the physical, but nevertheless...
1�Now, where was I? Ah, yes!The rub is that we scholars can only sustain this state of heightened faculties for a short duration.As the proverb goes: make use of time, let not advantage slip.

1�It is akin to how sprinting at full speed will quickly leave our bodies wanting for breath.Of course, even this is not truly ��full�� speed, as those subconscious reserves of strength remain largely dormant.
1�And what if we were to cast off the fetters of our mortal bodies entirely, gaining mental and physical powers beyond our wildest comprehension!?Yes, soon the day will come that...!
1�...Ah, but forgive me. My research has afforded me precious little time for respite of late.I fear my faculties are fraying.
1�The remainder of today's lesson you may glean from these tomes.To wit, they detail two arcane spells wieldable only by those in the heightened mental state of which I previously spoke.

1�And that concludes our class for the day.Study well your texts,  , and they will not fail you afield.Remember: the day a scholar stops learning is the day �[he/she] draws �[his/her] final breath!
1�What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.
1�Ahhh, so you're military tactician who who drew up the plans for this latest supply mission.Why don't we ask one of the men how its going, shall we?

1�What would you like to know?Nothing. I'm sorry.About performance assessment.About Allied Tags.About temporary items.About Unions.
1�Anyone wearing Allied Tags while participating in a campaign battle will be judged on their overall performance.
1�Soldiers will be evaluated not only on their fighting skills, but also on how much they contribute to the efforts of their allies through means such as healing and enhancing.
1�However, beware that if you leave the area before being assessed, you will be deemed a deserter and will forfeit all rewards earned that day.
1�Also, while there are no immediate penalties for being knocked out, falling in battle will significantly lower the score given to you.
1�When you are ready to receive compensation for your work on the field, return to me and I shall assess your performance and provide you with your payment.
1�That is all.
1�Allied Tags are a special type of identification given to all participants of Allied Campaign battles.
1�There are benefits, as well as drawbacks, to wearing the tags. One of the benefits is that in the case you are knocked out on the battlefield, you will not lose any experience points.
1�However, some of the drawbacks include the inability to improve skills and earn experience points for individual kills, as well as the right to loot fallen enemies.
1�That is all.
1�Temporary items can be purchased in exchange for Allied Notes.
1�There are several different varieties of items, but they all have one thing in common--they can only be used on the battlefield they were issued.
1�It is highly recommended that you first survey a battle's conditions and then select the supplies that you believe will benefit you most.
1�Please remember that all temporary items you carry on your person will be confiscated in the event that you leave the area.
1�That is all.
1�Oh ho! Keen to join a Union, are we?Very well. Listen up and I shall tell you all you need to know.

1�In order to better coordinate Allied efforts against the beastman menace, we have instituted a system of ad hoc tactical regiments called ��Unions.�� With five units to a battlefield, union registration is open to any proven soldier in possession of Allied Tags.
1�In return for their aid in advancing the war effort, union registrants will be eligible to earn a share of the spoils of war.

1�Needless to say, the choicest rewards will be reserved for those unions which make the greatest contributions in combat.Prove your mettle on the field of battle, and you will earn glory for your union, as well as a sizable bounty of your own.

1�Be forewarned that your commitment to your union comes first and foremost.In the aftermath of battle, you will not be permitted to reap rewards from your individual exploits until your union has distributed its plunder.
1�That is all.

1�I am Heptachiond, a friar from the San d'Orian Cathedral. I am here to pray for the departed.
1�Many devout believers of the Goddess have been laid to rest here. Sadly, though, the raging war has left their graves desecrated and in ruin.
1�I am Heptachiond, a friar from the San d'Orian Cathedral. I am here to pray for the departed.
1�Many devout believers of the Goddess have been laid to rest here. Sadly, though, the raging war has left their graves desecrated and in ruin.
1�There is naught I can do for these poor souls, save to light incense as an offering to their memory, and pray for their undisturbed, eternal rest. But alas, I have almost run out of incense.
1�A friend used to bring me incense, but I have been unable to contact him since he was posted to Fort Karugo-Narugo.
1�This special incense is handmade by my friend himself, and is imbued with his prayers for the departed. If only I could find a way to acquire more of them...
1�A friend used to bring me incense, but I have been unable to contact him since he was posted to Fort Karugo-Narugo.
1�This special incense is handmade by my friend himself, and is imbued with his prayers for the departed. If only I could find a way to acquire more of them...
1�Oh? Could that possibly be 6���� you have in your possession?
1�Then you have been to Fort Karugo-Narugo and met my friend. It was he who used to offer prayers here.
1�Even though my friend does not share the same faith as the San d'Orians interred here, he would come here to pray for them all the same. He is truly an admirable person, a model to us all.
1�But after the outbreak of the war, it became increasingly difficult for him to travel here as in the past. Under these circumstances, I felt it my duty to offer the incense on his behalf.
1�If some misfortune were to befall me, there would be no one left to honor the memory of the departed.
1�This graveyard must not be allowed to turn into a sorrowful place haunted by anguished souls.
1�I will see to it that these faithful children of Altana have the peace they deserve. This is my gift to you. Please accept it.
1�War is a terrible thing that robs both the living and departed of their peace.
1�Hey, you're in the way.We fortifyin' this here wall to withstand the beastmen's siege turrets.So how's about just gettin' outta here before you get hurt.
1�Unless you're willin' to wipe that helpless look off your face and lend us a hand.That'd be a different story.

1�Like I said, in preparation for an enemy assault, we're workin' to fortify these defensive barriers.If you're willin', I'd like to place you in charge of managin' these here craftsmen as they go about it.

1�To be more precise, once you get to each craftsman's position, you have to tell 'em exactly what I'm about to tell you.Namely, what type of crystal they need to be usin'. That's all there is to it.
1�The young Elvaan wearin' the red hat is a blacksmith.Make sure he's using fire crystals.
1�The adorable little Tarutaru with the blonde braids is laying plaster.Gonna have to get her on some ice crystals.
1�The Hume lady is a stonemason, and a darn good one.She's gonna be needin' wind crystals.
1�That old coot of an Elvaan with the huge axe strapped across his back is a carpenter.Famous 'round these parts. Make sure you get him workin' with earth crystals.
1�May not look it, but the Mithra with the black kerchief wrapped 'round her noggin is an architect.She's gonna need her lightning crystals.
1�That sprat of a Tarutaru wearin' the blue getup's a handy lil' plumber.Surin' he'll be wantin' his water crystals, no doubt.
1�The good-looking fella in all white does scaffoldin'. Young Hume lad.See to it he's usin' light crystals.
1�The lady Elvaan's a painter. Handles a brush like nobody I never seen.Need dark crystals in that line of work.And that's it.
1�Ahhh, one more thing.If you're too late issuin' your orders, they're liable to up and leave their posts.So be right, and be quick.
